short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share images, videos, urls just with a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect interesting things on the Web and share with others.

Itâ€™s now easier than ever to share interesting news with others all over the web just with a click of button. Share images, videos and many other things related to education, science news and write your thoughts about those. 

After installing the chrome extension a small button will appear whenever you hover over and image or a video for 2 seconds. Click on the button and share it on MachPrinciple.  

To get started, just log in or sign up for a free account in MachPrinciple.
